cookie.name: wordpress_
cookie.description: WordPress cookie for a logged in user.

cookie.name: wordpress_logged_in_
cookie.description: WordPress cookie for a logged in user

cookie.name: wordpress_test_
cookie.description: WordPress cookie for a logged in user

cookie.name: wordpress_test_cookie
cookie.description: WordPress test cookie

cookie.name: wp-settings-
cookie.description: Wordpress also sets a few wp-settings-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.

cookie.name: wp-settings-time-
cookie.description: Wordpress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.

cookie.name: PHPSESSID
cookie.description: To identify your unique session on the website

cookie.name: SESS
cookie.description: To ensure that you are recognised when you move from page to page within the site and that any information you have entered is remembered.

cookie.name: slimstat_tracking_code
cookie.description: This cookie tracks anonymous visitor website activity statistics.

cookie.name: qtrans_admin_language
cookie.description: Contains the primary language of the website administrator.

cookie.name: qtrans_cookie_test
cookie.description: A cookie to test if cookies are enabled.

cookie.name: TinyMCE_content_size
cookie.description: Cookie set by the TinyMCE editor indicating the size of the content being edited.

cookie.name: bb-user-settings
cookie.description: bb-user-settings-$UID and bb-user-settings-time-$UID are bbPress/Buddypress cookies that store the user's settings

cookie.name: bb_install_language
cookie.description: BuddyPress/bbPress installation language

cookie.name: bp-activity-oldestpage
cookie.description: On the default’s theme Activity page, rather than the list of activity being paginated, it has a “load more” button. The “bp-activity-oldestpage” cookie remembers what page of activity the “load more” is on.

cookie.name: bp-message
cookie.description: bp-message and bp-message-type are BuddyPress cookies. They contain a feedback (error/success) message to be displayed after the page reloads.

cookie.name: bp-wizard-step
cookie.description: Stores the step of the BuddyPress wizard

cookie.name: bp_completed_create_steps
cookie.description: Working in harmony with bp_new_group_id this records the completed steps for creation of a new buddyPress group

cookie.name: bp_messages_
cookie.description: bp_messages_send_to, bp_messages_subject and bp_messages_content are BuddyPress cookies for messages

cookie.name: bp_new_group_id
cookie.description: Contains the ID of a buddyPress group

cookie.name: __qca
cookie.description: The _qca cookie may use your "computer’s IP address, pixel code, referring HTTP location, current HTTP location, search string, time of the access, browser’s time, any searches made on the applicable website, and other statistics" in order to "analyze Log Data from different websites and combine it with other non Personally Identifiable Information to produce the Reports that are made available on the Quantcast.com Site, to enable web publishers and advertisers to deliver audience segments that are appropriate for their products or services."

cookie.name: vc_widget_generic-expert
cookie.description: Cookie created by vCita - part of Fast Secure Contact form admin page

cookie.name: c_id
cookie.description: c_id is a Shareaholic cookie for social media sharing analytics and reporting

cookie.name: lps
cookie.description: Shareaholic cookie for social media sharing, analytics and reporting

cookie.name: no_cp
cookie.description: Set by shareaholic - sexybookmarks - this cookie is associated with the message "Get the shareaholic chrome extension - It is the best way to share your content, discover, and connect with the Best of the Web!"

cookie.name: pss
cookie.description: Shareaholic cookie for social media sharing, analytics and reporting

cookie.name: SnapABugHistory
cookie.description: unique identifiers given to each computer and some important session information to allow us to provide online help

cookie.name: SnapABugVisit
cookie.description: set when visiting Shareaholic Analytics Settings

cookie.name: uvc
cookie.description: The uvc cookie is one of the cookies used to track usage of the Addthis.com service. It allows a user to share a webpage with many social sites.

cookie.name: __utma
cookie.description: This cookie keeps track of the number of times a visitor has been to the site pertaining to the cookie, when their first visit was, and when their last visit occurred. Google Analytics uses the information from this cookie to calculate things like Days and Visits to purchase.

cookie.name: __utmb
cookie.description: __utmb is a Google Analytics cookie. It takes a timestamp of the exact moment in time when a visitor enters a site.

cookie.name: __utmc
cookie.description: __utmc takes a timestamp of the exact moment in time when a visitor leaves a site.

cookie.name: comment_author_
cookie.description: WordPress comment cookie.

cookie.name: comment_author_email
cookie.description: Similar to comment_author_

cookie.name: comment_author_url
cookie.description: Similar to comment_author_

cookie.name: civicAllowCookies
cookie.description: Cookie Control user interface to remember your preference

cookie.name: civicShowCookieIcon
cookie.description: Cookie Control user interface to remember your preference

cookie.name: __utmz
cookie.description: Keeps track of where the visitor came from, what search engine you used, what link you clicked on, what keyword you used, and where they were in the world when you accessed a website. This cookie is how Google Analytics knows to whom and to what source / medium / keyword to assign the credit for a Goal Conversion or an Ecommerce Transaction.
